title: Zed q cast time?
body: Give zed q a cast time. That way you can attack while he stands still and he can't burst as fast when he ults. Would this help ?

replies.body:
I thought Zed paused for like half a second to use his shuriken...

Anyways, assassins without fluid motions / synergies in their kit feel really awkward and clunky to play as.

Think {{champion:84}} .

Without her e popping the q mark, along with her e's cast time, it honestly feels weird using that spell when all it does is give you minimal wave clear / slows you down / deals underwhelming amounts of damage without popping q.
